verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away to the other side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> which is also called the Sea of Tiberias. <S%G5085><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> A <S%G3793><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they saw <S%G3708><s%> his <S%G846><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> those who were sick. <S%G770><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went up <S%G424><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> he sat <S%G2521><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> at hand. <S%G1451><s%>

<S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> lifting up <S%G1869><s%> his eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G2300><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> a <S%G3754><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was coming <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> "Where <S%G4159><s%> are we to buy <S%G59><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> may eat? <S%G5315><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to test <S%G3985><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> he would <S%G3195><s%> do. <S%G4160><s%>

Philip <S%G5376><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Two hundred <S%G1250><s%> denarii <S%G1220><s%> worth of bread <S%G740><s%> is <S%G714><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sufficient <S%G714><s%> for them, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> everyone <S%G1538><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> may receive <S%G2983><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> little. <S%G1024><s%>"

One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>'s brother, <S%G80><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%>

"There is <S%G2076><s%> a boy <S%G3808><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> barley <S%G2916><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> fish, <S%G3795><s%> but <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> so many? <S%G5118><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Have the people <S%G444><s%> sit down. <S%G377><s%>" Now <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> grass <S%G5528><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that place. <S%G5117><s%> So <S%G3767><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> sat down, <S%G377><s%> in number <S%G706><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> five thousand. <S%G4000><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> the loaves; <S%G740><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> having given thanks, <S%G2168><s%> he distributed <S%G1239><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to those who were sitting down; <S%G345><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> also of <S%G1537><s%> the fish <S%G3795><s%> as <S%G3745><s%> much as <S%G3745><s%> they desired. <S%G2309><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> they were filled, <S%G1705><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Gather up <S%G4863><s%> the broken pieces <S%G2801><s%> which are left <S%G4052><s%> over, <S%G2443><s%> that nothing <S%G3361><s%> <S%G99999><s%> be lost. <S%G622><s%>"

So <S%G3767><s%> they gathered <S%G4863><s%> them up, <S%G4863><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> filled <S%G1072><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> with broken pieces <S%G2801><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> barley <S%G2916><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> were left over <S%G4052><s%> by those who had eaten. <S%G977><s%>

When <S%G3767><s%> therefore the people <S%G444><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> they said, <S%G3754><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> truly <S%G230><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> who comes <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>"

<S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> perceiving <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they were about to <S%G2443><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> take <S%G726><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by force, <S%G726><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> him <S%G846><s%> king, <S%G935><s%> withdrew <S%G402><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the mountain <S%G3735><s%> by <S%G3441><s%> himself. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G1161><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G1096><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> they entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat, <S%G4143><s%> and were going <S%G2064><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum. <S%G2584><s%> It <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> dark, <S%G4653><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>
The <S%G5037><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> was tossed <S%G1326><s%> by a great <S%G3173><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> blowing. <S%G4154><s%>

When <S%G3767><s%> therefore they had rowed <S%G1643><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> - five <S%G4002><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> stadia, <S%G4712><s%> they saw <S%G2334><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drawing <S%G1096><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to the boat; <S%G4143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

They were willing <S%G2309><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat. <S%G4143><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> where <S%G1519><s%> they <S%G3739><s%> were going. <S%G5217><s%>

On the next <S%G1887><s%> day, <S%G3793><s%> the multitude that stood <S%G2476><s%> on the other side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> boat <S%G4142><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G1520><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> had embarked, <S%G1684><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> hadn't <S%G3756><s%> entered <S%G4897><s%> with <S%G4897><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat, <S%G4142><s%> but <S%G235><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> had gone away <S%G565><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>

However <S%G1161><s%> <S%G243><s%> boats <S%G4142><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> Tiberias <S%G5085><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> near to <S%G1451><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> they ate <S%G5315><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> after <S%G2168><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had given thanks. <S%G2168><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G99999><s%> wasn't <S%G3756><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> they <S%G846><s%> themselves <S%G2532><s%> got <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boats, <S%G4143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> they found <S%G2147><s%> him <S%G846><s%> on the other side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> they asked <S%G2036><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> did you <S%G1096><s%> come here? <S%G5602><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "Most <S%G281><s%> certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> signs, <S%G4592><s%> but <S%G235><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you ate <S%G5315><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the loaves, <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were filled. <S%G5526><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> for the food <S%G1035><s%> which perishes, <S%G622><s%> but <S%G235><s%> for the food <S%G1035><s%> which remains <S%G3306><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has <S%G4972><s%> sealed <S%G4972><s%> him. <S%G5126><s%>"

They <S%G2036><s%> said therefore <S%G3767><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> must we do, <S%G4160><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may work <S%G2038><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G2532><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him whom <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> has sent. <S%G649><s%>"

They said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> do for a sign, <S%G4592><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may see, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> you? <S%G4671><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> work do you do? <S%G2038><s%>

Our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> ate <S%G5315><s%> the manna <S%G3131><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G1325><s%> 'He gave them <S%G846><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> to eat. <S%G5315><s%>'"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Most <S%G281><s%> certainly, <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> it wasn't <S%G3756><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> who gave <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but <S%G235><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> the <S%G740><s%> true <S%G228><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> that which comes down <S%G2597><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> to the world. <S%G2889><s%>"

They <S%G2036><s%> said therefore <S%G3767><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%> He who comes <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> will <S%G3983><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4455><s%> be hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he who believes <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> will <S%G1372><s%> never <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4455><s%> be thirsty. <S%G1372><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I told <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you <S%G3708><s%> <S%G2532><s%> have seen <S%G3708><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> yet you don't <S%G3756><s%> believe. <S%G4100><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G3739><s%> whom the Father <S%G3962><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> who comes <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> I will <S%G1544><s%> in no <S%G3756><s%> way <S%G3361><s%> throw <S%G1544><s%> out. <S%G1854><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> I have come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> my own <S%G1699><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of him who sent <S%G3992><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> my Father <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> he has given <S%G1325><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> I should lose <S%G622><s%> nothing, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> should raise <S%G450><s%> him up <S%G450><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of the one who <S%G2443><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> everyone <S%G3956><s%> who sees <S%G2334><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> in him, <S%G846><s%> should have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will raise <S%G450><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G450><s%> at the <S%G2250><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> murmured <S%G1111><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> which came down <S%G2597><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>"

They <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2076><s%> "Isn't <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> know? <S%G1492><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> does <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2597><s%>" 'I have come down out of <S%G2597><s%> heaven? <S%G3772><s%>'"
